name: TC_55!300 (Lang: ar) | Bid:55!300-ar.ae.NoReg
description:
Check:  The "TradingView" page is opened in EN language instead AR language,
                when clicked [Explore features] button on the "Web platform" page for AR language is selected
        Language: AR
        Country: SCA
        Role: NoReg, Auth, NoAuth
        Author: Artem Dashkov
descriptionHtml:
Check:  The "TradingView" page is opened in EN language instead AR language,
            when clicked [Explore features] button on the "Web platform" page for AR language is selected
    Language: AR
    Country: SCA
    Role: NoReg, Auth, NoAuth
    Author: Artem Dashkov

testStage.description:
Check:  The "TradingView" page is opened in EN language instead AR language,
                when clicked [Explore features] button on the "Web platform" page for AR language is selected
        Language: AR
        Country: SCA
        Role: NoReg, Auth, NoAuth
        Author: Artem Dashkov

steps.name: Start test of the [Explore features] button in the 'Web platform' page

parameters.name: desc_tc

attachments.name: [Explore features] button is clickable on this page!
